mapper.insert: insert into match_board(match_board_no, member_id, match_board_title ,match_board_content, match_board_city, match_board_location, match_board_date, match_board_time2, match_board_age, match_board_size) values (#{matchBoardNo}, #{memberId}, #{matchBoardTitle}, #{matchBoardContent}, #{matchBoardCity}, #{matchBoardLocation}, #{matchBoardDate}, #{matchBoardTime2}, #{matchBoardAge}, #{matchBoardSize})
mapper.update: update match_board set match_board_status = '모집마감' where match_board_no = #{matchBoardNo}
mapper.select: select * from match_board order by match_board_no desc
select * from match_board where instr(${column}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by ${column} asc
mapper.update: update match_board set match_board_read = match_board_read + 1 where match_board_no = #{matchBoardNo}
update match_board set match_board_reply = (select count(*) from match_reply where match_board_no = #{matchBoardNo}) where match_board_no = #{matchBoardNo}
